query_translation.sql.utilities_sql

Class SQLTranslate

  • java.lang.Object
    • query_translation.sql.utilities_sql.SQLTranslate

  • public class SQLTranslate
extends java.lang.Object
    MAIN TRANSLATION UNIT FROM INTERMEDIATE TRANSLATION TO SQL.

    Read individual methods documentation for more understanding. - MultipleRel - NoRels - SingleVarRel

    Agnostic to the methods above is appending the ORDER BY, GROUP BY, LIMIT and SKIP elements.

      • obtainGroupByClause

        private static java.lang.StringBuilder obtainGroupByClause(ReturnClause rc,
                                                           java.lang.StringBuilder sql)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Appends GROUP BY clause to query. This is needed if COUNT is used. Note - not entirely sure logic is correct for this method, needs more testing.
        Parameters:
        rc - Return Clause of the Cypher query.
        sql - Query before GROUP BY
        Returns:
        Query after GROUP BY
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error reading the associated metafile from the workarea location.
